TopicTitle: Editing the persistence to make a flight revert-able

Articles.Content: I asked this on a thread (only a minor bump but it got locked anyway); how do I edit my persistence file to make a flight able to revert?

You don't, because it's not possible. The previous save state that can be reverted to does not live in the save file.

Also, there's no such thing as a "minor bump." A bump is a bump is a bump

Yes, but come on. There was no reason to lock it.

Has there ever been a suggestion to let you revert at any time?

That's what the quicksave is for.

Revert is loading an old save. It's not a magical 'go back to the launchpad' button, it's just a reload. That save file is only kept until you move on to something else

And yes there was every reason. The reason was: Necro
